parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A client token used to ensure the idempotence of a request. The client generates this value, which must be unique across different requests. The token can be up to 64 ASCII characters in length.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

- zh: Chinese.

- en: English.

Default value: en.

parameters.name: RecordId
parameters.description: The ID of the DNS record.
